text: LP1 is the fifth studio album by English singer-songwriter Joss Stone. It was released on 21 July 2011 on Stone's own label, Stone'd Records, after she had left her label EMI in 2010. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== Credits adapted from the liner notes of LP1. * Joss Stone – vocals, executive producer, production * Tom Bukovac – guitar * Kristin Burns – photography * Tom Coyne – mastering * Chad Cromwell – drums, percussion * Dan Dugmore – pedal steel guitar * Steve Greenwell – additional engineering, mixing * Dave Kaplan – executive producer * John McBride – engineering * Wendy Moten – backing vocals * Brian Nelson – executive producer * Luke Potter – additional guitar * Drea Rhenee – backing vocals * Michael Rhodes – bass * Mike Rojas – keyboards * Dave Stewart – cover photo, guitar, production * Kevin Tetreault – design, layout ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== Chart (2011) Peak position Australian Albums Chart 58 Australian Jazz & Blues Albums Chart 1 Austrian Albums Chart 15 Belgian Albums Chart (Flanders) 12 Belgian Albums Chart (Wallonia) 39 Canadian Albums Chart 15 Danish Albums Chart 38 Dutch Albums Chart 6 French Albums Chart 46 German Albums Chart 5 Italian Albums Chart 80 Japanese Albums Chart 153 Portuguese Albums Chart 30 Scottish Albums Chart 58 Swiss Albums Chart 2 UK Albums Chart 36 UK Indie Albums Chart 7 US Billboard 200 9 US Independent Albums 2 US Top R&B;/Hip-Hop Albums 3 ===Year- end charts=== Chart (2011) Position Australian Jazz & Blues Albums Chart 14 Swiss Albums Chart 88 US Top R&B;/Hip-Hop Albums 81 ==Release history== Region Date Format Label Portugal 21 July 2011 CD Germany 22 July 2011 Sony Digital download Netherlands CD United Kingdom 24 July 2011 Digital download France 25 July 2011 CD Universal Digital download Italy Netherlands Portugal United Kingdom Canada 26 July 2011 Italy CD Edel United States Australia 29 July 2011 Universal Japan 24 August 2011 CD Victor Entertainment ==References== Category:2011 albums Category:Joss Stone albums Category:Soul albums Category:Blue-eyed soul albums Category:R&B;
